extendedInfo.description: The best photo gallery and picture browser&viewer in Android, more quick and clear, just as millions of users say!1. View and slide show with best quality, more clear than other apps.2. Quick browsing tons of pictures, quick find all your pictures, without background service.3. Include or exclude the specified folders to make more efficient scanning.4. Easy hide your photos and videos from the gallery apps, protect them with a password.5. Play animated-GIFs and standard videos.6. Smooth experience: sliding shift or switch, single or double tap or pinch to zoom.7. Rotate, shrink, crop pictures, set wallpaper with best quality.8. More file management features: sort, rename, create new folder, move and copy pictures.9. Optimized for HD tablets10. It is free and no ads!HTC users:   You can not share a photo to MMS again, HTC don't allow a third app to do this again, please report it to HTC!ãThere are hundreds of phones/tablets running Android, I am always doing my best to make my app working fine on every device. So, if you find any issue, before you post useless comments or rating, please try to send email to me, I will help you to fix it.Tips:Please BACKUP YOUR IMPORTANT PHOTOS before your do file operations!Long press a thumbnail to move/copy to another or new folder. Enter multi-select mode to find the batch operations.Include the picture folders only in the settings to speed up the scanning.Can't sync Picasa or Facebook or other web albums.Can't show TIFF.Can't set lock screen's wallpaper because of private interface.Show 3D photos(MPO,JPS) with 2D mode.Reinstall the app to clear your password.Video is no my target, if you think video playing is not good enough, please go to the market and find a good one...

reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
reviews.comment: Still best gallery on the Play Store. It\'s very fast once all the previews are loaded, very fast to navigate with a drag bar, and easy to move things around. One of my must have apps I tell everyone to get. Only things I wish it had was syncing with Google Photos, NFC transfers, and an auto events grouping view by years, months, weeks, and/or days would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: easy to use , quick and variety .. love it  (\342\231\245\342\210\200\342\231\245)

reviews.comment: Great app, super fast and smooth. I only have a suggestion, it would be so good to have a folder with all my photos  :D

reviews.title: The best.
reviews.comment: Password protected/hidden folders. Awesome viewing options. Great system options. Fast & awesome.

reviews.title: Extremely important app
reviews.comment: This is one of best app I have ever seen. Small size, low memory uses. Nice thanks a lot for such app. I really appreciate it & recommend everyone to use it.

reviews.comment: It is very cool app. And much faster than default android gallery... u can organise ur pics simply.

reviews.title: EXCELLENT! Super fast once the initial cache is built.
reviews.comment: EXCELLENT! Super fast once the initial cache is built. Has more \'share\' options than stock apps and edit feature is super easy to crop/rotate/share.

reviews.title: Simple n great slideshows
reviews.comment: I was looking for a simple slideshow app and this is exactly what I wanted! The slideshow is simple, crisp, easy viewing!

reviews.comment: Best,good and easy to use :) also fast!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome application, small size, low memory usage, simple, no ads and of course it\'s free. This is the best photo gallery I have been seen. Good job. Maybe in the next version the developer can add browse image from web album (I hope).
reviews.author: Dandy Arifiyanto

reviews.title: Perfect but could be better
reviews.comment: This App is great, but could be better by adding a option to move files from one folder to another instead of just being able to copy images.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt incorperate photos from external SD
reviews.comment: My stock gallery shows photos on phone storage and ext_Sd storage in \"camera\" folder. But with quickpic it only shows the phone storage, and then i have to add ext_sd as a separate folder. Really annoying. I want both DCIM folders from each storage to be in the same \"Camera\" folder when viewing in quickpic like they are in the stock gallery.
reviews.author: Dan Legere

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, i am very rarely to give comment for a compliment, and giving 5 stars. But now i am doing it.  Thanks, i like it since it very easy
